column1: Meadow Woods is a census-designated place and an unincorporated suburban development area located in southern Orange County
column4: between Orlando International Airport and Kissimmee. The population was 25
column7: 286 in 2000. It is part of the Orlando–Kissimmee–Sanford

column1: == Geography ==
Meadow Woods is located at 28°22′29″N 81°21′50″W (28.374852
column3: in the southern portion of Orange County outside of the Orlando city limits. Its southern side is adjacent to Buenaventura Lakes in Osceola County
column4: to the west is located Southchase (Orange County)
column5: to the north are the unincorporated community of Taft and the Boggy Creek neighborhood of Orlando city proper
column6: and to the east are Orlando International Airport and Lake Nona.

column1: == Transportation ==
The major roads of the small community of Meadow Woods are Landstar Boulevard
column2: Town Center Boulevard/Rhode Island Woods Circle/Wyndham Lakes Boulevard

column1: The Central Florida Greeneway (SR 417) serves Meadow Woods
column2: which has an access at the intersection with Landstar Boulevard at Exit 14.

column1: Orlando International Airport borders Meadow Woods to the north and east.
SunRail has plans to extend its commuter rail service south to the area as part of Phase II of the project
column2: which will include a new commuter rail station. The new Meadow Woods train station has opened on 23 June 2018 with the regular train schedule starting next Monday June 30. The rail line also handles Amtrak's Silver Service lines as well as several CSX freight trains.

column1: Meadow Woods is served by Lynx bus routes 18 (on Landstar Boulevard) and FastLink 418 (on Rhode Island Woods Circle). In June 2013
column2: Orange County Commissioner Jennifer Thompson asked for $300
column4: which provides a connection to the Sand Lake Road SunRail station
column5: which currently serves as the rail line's interim southern terminus. With installation of the new Sunrail train station
column6: the bus routes has been adjusted a little bit.

column1: == Points of interest ==
Meadow Woods Recreation Center with a community gym and offices is located within a park area
Several elementary and middle grade schools
Warehouses for Whirlpool Corporation
South Orange Youth Sports Complex includes several baseball fields
Newly expanded shopping plaza at Town Center and Landstar includes main markets like Publix
column3: pharmacies convenience stores CVS and Walgreens
